argument.description: The string whose phonetic value will be returned.

returnType: The SOUNDEX function returns a string value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL SOUNDEX function returns a phonetic representation (the way it sounds) of a string.
sample:
SOUNDEX('tech on the net')
Result: 'T253'

SOUNDEX('TECH ON THE NET')
Result: 'T253'

SOUNDEX('apples')
Result: 'A142'

SOUNDEX('apples are great')
Result: 'A142'

SOUNDEX('applus')
Result: 'A142'
